channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#0235; 05:36AM; 3865 W Boyce Av; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3QTuNim" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3QTuNim</a>; #AtwaterVillage; *Address Tentative* 30 LAFD Firefighters took 26 minutes (6:02 AM) to extinguish flames in a one-story home that was well involved with fire on their arrival. No injury. Fire cause under active investigation.; FS 50; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC1 BC2 BC5 CM20 CM22 E201 E220 E235 E35 E44 E55 E56 EM5 RA35 RA850 SO1 T1 T20 T35; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

ADVISORY; 10:00AM; Hansen Dam Recreation Area; MAP: <a href="https://maps.app.goo.gl/9g71V5nJLJgDzeMQA" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://maps.app.goo.gl/9g71V5nJLJgDzeMQA</a>; #LakeViewTerrace; As a result of first responders training for future wildfires, residents of foothill communities near the Hansen Dam Recreation Area in the northeast San Fernando Valley may notice an ongoing presence of public safety aircraft, including fire department helicopters periodically flying in formation, until 2:00 PM today. There is NO emergency and no need for public action. Again, this is a one day only training involving public safety aircraft and ground personnel that will conclude by 2:00 PM. We appreciate the community's support as our agencies prepare together to battle future wildfires.; - Brian Humphrey

title.a: Knockdown - Major Emergency Structure Fire 05/19/2024 INC#0178

item.description: Knockdown - Major Emergency Structure Fire; INC#0178; 04:53AM; 1624 Schrader Bl; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3QPLHye" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3QPLHye</a>; #Hollywood; It took the relentless and well-coordinated effort of 127 LAFD Firefighters just 98 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish heavy fire in the sub-floor/basement, both above ground floors and attic of a vacant and abandoned two-story hotel. No injuries reported. Fire cause under active investigation. LAFD Public Information Officer - Firefighter David Ortiz, is en route to assist the media, with an ETA of 5:20 AM.; FS 27; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC18 BC5 CM20 CM22 CM52 E20 E203 E211 E220 E226 E227 E229 E235 E261 E27 E3 E37 E41 E60 E61 E76 E82 EA1 EA2 EM11 EM5 FR82 HR3 PI4 RA27 RA3 RA803 RA82 RA827 SQ21 T11 T20 T26 T27 T29 T3 T35 T61 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12 13; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update Major Emergency Structure Fire 05/19/2024 INC#0178

item.description: Update Major Emergency Structure Fire; INC#0178; 04:15AM; 1624 Schrader Bl; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3QPLHye" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3QPLHye</a>; #Hollywood; This fire is now categorized as a Major Emergency, with 126 LAFD Firefighters assigned, relentlessly battling heavy fire in the sub-floor/basement, both above ground floors and attic of a vacant and abandoned two-story hotel. No injuries reported.; FS 27; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC1 BC11 BC18 BC5 CM20 CM22 CM52 E203 EA1 E227 E229 E235 E261 E27 E3 E41 E61 E76 E82 EM11 EM5 FR82 HR3 RA27 RA3 RA803 RA82 RA827 SQ21 T27 T29 T3 T35 T61 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12 13; Brian Humphrey

Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0178; 03:15AM; 1624 Schrader Bl; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3QPLHye" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3QPLHye</a>; #Hollywood; PRELIM: Defensive firefighting operations at an abandoned two-story vacant hotel. ; FS 27; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC1 BC11 BC18 BC5 CM20 CM22 E203 E227 E229 E235 E261 E27 E3 E41 E61 E76 E82 EM11 EM5 FR82 HR3 RA27 RA3 RA803 RA82 RA827 SQ21 T27 T29 T3 T35 T61 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12 13; Brian Humphrey

Update Structure Fire; INC#1561; 09:45PM; 4712 S Budlong Ave; MAP: <a href="https://maps.app.goo.gl/fXUroRqsqJTffFo1A" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://maps.app.goo.gl/fXUroRqsqJTffFo1A</a>; #VermontSquare; *Address Further Corrected* The address for the two-story detached residence over garage (accessory dwelling unit) involved in the fire has been corrected to 4712 S Budlong Avenue. ; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC11 BC13 E15 E215 E266 E46 E66 RA246 RA846 RA866 SQ21 T15 T66; CH7; 12; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1561; 09:41PM; 4706 S Budlong; MAP: <a href="https://maps.app.goo.gl/PjgPcwpxaaJssc9A9" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://maps.app.goo.gl/PjgPcwpxaaJssc9A9</a>; #VermontSquare; *Address Corrected* 36 LAFD Firefighters took just 21 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish an outside fire that extended into a two-story detached residence over garage (accessory dwelling unit), with flames extending to the attic. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC11 BC13 E15 E215 E266 E46 E66 RA246 RA846 RA866 SQ21 T15 T66; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1561; 09:20PM; 1120 W 47th St; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/4boe27c" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/4boe27c</a>; #VermontSquare; PRELIM: Two story detached residence over garage well involved with fire.; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC11 BC13 E15 E215 E266 E46 E66 RA246 RA846 SQ21 T15 T66; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

Hiker Rescue; INC#0688; 12:01PM; Santa Monica Mountains; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3QRsrQO" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3QRsrQO</a>; #PacificPalisades; PRELIM: LAFD ground and air response to an 28 year-old female hiker with an apparent ankle fracture, on a remote section of the Temescal Ridge Trail in Topanga State Park. An LAFD Rescue Helicopter has lowered a Flight Paramedic to medically assess and stabilize the patient, who will soon be hoisted along with the LAFD Flight Paramedic into the hovering helicopter for continuing in-flight care during direct air transport to an area hospital.; FS 69; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; AO1 BC9 E269 E69 H1 H6 HA1 HA6 RA69 RH114 T69; CH7; 12; Brian Humphrey

Pedestrian Struck by Train; INC#0492; 09:44AM; 6900 Vineland Ave; MAP: <a href="https://maps.app.goo.gl/YRBysA7kz98jj76z6" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://maps.app.goo.gl/YRBysA7kz98jj76z6</a>; #NorthHollywood; PRELIM: One pedestrian (unknown age / gender / affiliation / circumstances) deceased after apparently being struck by southbound Amtrak Pacific Surfliner Train #770. The person and train remain at scene. None of the approximately 150 persons aboard the intercity passenger train are injured. Media Inquiries: Amtrak, LAPD Valley Traffic Division (Incident #1566) and Medical Examiner.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E102 E239 E60 E86 E89 EM5 HR3 RA257 RA60 T39 UR88; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey
